DOC.HEADLINE: FOR THE RECORD
DOC.TEXT: Movie rating -- An item on the front page of Wednesday ' s Calendar about this week ' s video release of the Martin Lawrence concert film , " You So Crazy , " mistakenly reported the film ' s rating . The Motion_Picture Assn . of America originally rated the movie NC-17 . Miramax protested the rating , lost the protest and then released the film without a rating .
